name: Pythagoras
overview: A German language strategy game created by Marc Fischlin in 1990 (with version 2.0 coming out a year later). Pythagoras is a trading game where 1-4 players try to qualify as king of their city. It takes place around 550 BC. At the time of the colonization of the Mediterranean region. The player has many options for action: he can trade, distribute lands, fighting wars, levy taxes, plunder towns, buy or sell ships, buy land, etc. Almost the entire game can be controlled with the mouse.
